Title: Relates to the provision of legal representation to certain persons in eviction, ejectment and foreclosure proceedings
Summary: Requires counties and/or cities to establish a plan for providing legal counsel to persons who are defendants or respondents in eviction, ejectment and foreclosure proceedings and who are financially unable to obtain counsel; defines eligible person as one whose gross individual income is not in excess of one hundred twenty-five percent of the federal income official poverty line; requires the state to match dollar for dollar the amount counties appropriate for their plans.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the county law, in relation to the provision of legal representation to certain persons in eviction, ejectment and foreclosure proceedings
